name: FPS Shotgun & Turrets
description:
A great prototype, FPS with placeble turrets and upgrades.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to run
  • left click shoot
  • b to place turrets(can't place them too close to each other)
  • If you go to the white glob and press e, you can take a spell and press right click to upgrade your turrets(damage wise, you will not see anything anyway)
